episodes.title: Why I Left the JW Cult Part 2
episodes.description:
In this video, I continue sharing my experience growing up as a Jehovah’s Witness—this time focusing on the deep isolation and loneliness that came with it. From strict rules about friendships to the constant fear of disappointing the congregation, I felt trapped in a world where I could never truly be myself. If you’ve ever felt alone in your faith or struggled with leaving a high-control religion, you’re not alone.

I’d love to hear your thoughts and experiences in the comments. Let’s support each other!

#exjw #jehovahswitness #highcontrolreligion #religioustrauma

episodes.title: Why I left the JW Cult
episodes.description:
Growing up as a Jehovah’s Witness was rough, and I want to share my story. In this video, I talk about what it was really like—how it shaped me, the struggles I went through, and why I finally had to walk away. It wasn’t easy, but leaving was the best decision I ever made.

If you’ve ever felt trapped in a strict religion or just want to hear a real, honest experience, this video is for you. Thanks for watching, and don’t forget to subscribe if you want to hear more about my journey and where I’m at now.

#ExJW #JehovahsWitness #ReligiousTrauma #MyStory #HealingJourney
